messages.title: Theresa May - A strong, stable leadership in the national interest

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment across the constituency, including in a rejuvenated Maidenhead town centre
Ensuring every child has a good local school place

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting the character of our area

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protecting our fast services to London

issues.education: Local schools: Having access to a choice of good schools is very important for local parents across the Maidenhead constituency
issues.health: Supporting the NHS: Theresa will always back our local NHS services...She has supported the redevelopment of St Marks Hospital in Maidenhead, such as the minor injuries unit
issues.labourEmployment: Securing more jobs: Creating new jobs and apprenticeships
issues.transport: Improving local train services: She has successfully campaigned for the new Elizabeth Line (Crossrail) to be extended from Maidenhead to Twyford and Reading. The branch lines are also important for residents travelling to other places

community.content: Planning and Development: Theresa will always fight to protect the character of this part of Berkshire.

leaflet.personalStatement: Theresa has been our hard-working local MP since 1997. She lives in the constituency with her husband Philip, and is an active campaigner on the issues that matter to local people: jobs, schools, the NHS, train services, and much more.

images.caption: Theresa May meeting people and participating in community events

examples: Since last year she had the honour of being appointed as our Prime Minister
She has supported the redevelopment of St Marks Hospital in Maidenhead
Ensuring every child has a good local school place
Theresa will always fight to protect the character of this part of Berkshire
Theresa has been our hard-working local MP since 1997
She lives in the constituency with her husband Philip, and is an active campaigner
Securing more jobs: Creating new jobs and apprenticeships
Supporting our schools: Ensuring every child has a good local school place
